text: BREAKING: 6ix9ine is anticipated to be released from Prison shortly after his Judge and Prosecutor both agree that he should be given 'Home Confinement' aka 'House Arrest' to serve the rest of his sentence due to his asthma medical condition during the coronavirus outbreak.
